name: Robot Escape (Anamura)
description:
Robot Escape is a short puzzle game that is part of the Cosmorama series.

This game was born as a challenge, that consisted in creating a simple game in less than 15 hours, and I did it in just around 5 hours. You just have to cross some maps with evil robots to reach a vehicle to go away from the city. If you touch the robots you die and begin again from the start of that map. Really easy!

This game was developed with RPG Maker MV.

Move with the arrows. Collect all the coins for a little extra surprise at the end.

Go back to Cosmorama
